craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: On a kill or assist, gain an additional 15 Attack Damage until end of combat (Stacks infinitely).

craf.add_attrs: Attacks deal an additional 5% enemy max Health as True Damage.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Attacks heal for 40% of damage

craf.add_attrs: On death, Repeating Crossbow bounces to a new unit and grants an extra +30% Attack Speed and +30% Crit chance

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap

craf.name: LudensEcho

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs: On start of combat, allies two spaces to the left and right gain a shield of 300 for 8 seconds.

craf.name: IonicSpark

craf.add_attrs: Spells deal burn damage equal to 20% of the enemy's maximum health over 10s and prevent healing

craf.add_attrs: Your spells can Crit

craf.name: FrozenHeart

craf.name: Hush

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: On crossing below 30% health, heal all nearby allies for 1200 Health

craf.name: HandofJustice

craf.name: Thornmail

craf.name: RedBuff
craf.add_attrs: Attacks deal 20% of the enemy's maximum Health as burn damage over 10s and prevent healing

craf.name: Quicksilver

craf.name: WarmogsArmor

craf.name: Backhand

spec.name: SwordoftheDivine
spec.desc: Each second, the wearer has a 7% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike

spec.name: NeekosHelp
spec.desc: Place on a champion to create a 1-star copy of that champion and add it to your bench. Doing so consumes Neeko's Help.

spec.name: RunaansHurricane
spec.desc: Summon a spirit who mirrors your attacks, dealing 75% Damage
